title: Vesting of lands with the Police Station in Kottawa
decision_details: - The proposal made by Hon. Patali Champika Ranawaka, the Minister of Megapolis and Western Development, to vest the block of land in extent of 49.80 perches with the Police Department, to set up the Police Station in Kottawa, which has been vested with the Urban Development Authority (UDA) by the Government, was approved by the Cabinet.
